__e: Arthur came here yesterday and asked our mother for money.
He was the Iast baby my father delivered, Arthur was.
The kindest thing you can do for Arthur is tell him that.
You have no idea what Arthur needs... -...what'll make him happy.
Arthur has something he wants to tell all of you.
(SIGHS) Arthur killed your father, he could kill us all, or worse.
Where are you and Arthur going?
Um, I saw Arthur, and, uh, I waved him into the car.
Arthur and his wife were killed in a car accident two days ago.

Artur doesn't know the meaning of the word.

I tell you, Arthur. I've never met anyone like him.
